name: Baker's Aquarium
description:
From Brian Keene's The Rising

A short mini-game from the upcoming game Brian Keene's The Rising made in a few days for the DreadXP: Dredge the Depths Game Jam.

In a world where the dead have started to rise, scientist Dr. Baker and his colleagues experiment with their fish to see if the phenomenon affects animals as well...

Look: Mouse

Movement:

W / S - Forward / Back

A / D - Left / Right

Q / E - Down / Up

Shift - Sprint

Unfortunately cutscenes and the end scene were cut for time, but I thought the gameplay was fun enough to submit.  The game will freeze after the final "quick time event".  Updates will be made shortly after the jam ends. -J
